nodes.text: Batuuan Beef Pot Roast was a meat dish served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. It was suitable for consumption by humans. Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs made it with Batuuan cows that were grass-fed on Naboo, along with mushrooms, greens, and pasta.

Batuuan Beef Pot Roast was introduced in the real world as Braised Shaak Roast at the Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo eatery in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, where it has been available with differing names since the opening in 2019. The dish consists of a beef pot roast with cavatelli pasta, wilted kale, and mushrooms. A recipe for the dish as Braised Shaak Roast is included in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, written by Marc Sumerak and Chelsea Monroe-Cassel. Unlike the in-universe version of Braised Shaak Roast, Batuuan Beef Pot Roast does not use shaak.
